channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20245] Vectorization: Fix NULL / Wrong Results issues in BETWEEN / IN
item.description:
Write new UT tests that use random data and intentional isRepeating batches to checks for NULL and Wrong Results for vectorized BETWEEN and IN.

Add, missing vectorization classes for BETWEEN PROJECTION.
item.summary: Vectorization: Fix NULL / Wrong Results issues in BETWEEN / IN

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
